Description: If a claim is denied due to being billed to another system, it is moved to Manager Hold.
Medicare denials requiring adjustments are processed.
If the Medicare secondary charge is zero and there is no outstanding balance, the claim is closed.
If a previous denial exists and meets certain conditions, further denial processing is triggered.

Condition: Prior appeal occurred at least 7 days after denial

Description: Small claims are eligible for automatic denial marking.
Ensures denial note is correctly applied.
